body_html:
The model is convert from the cudnn model trained by myseft
the code below is the convert code

require 'nn'
require 'cudnn'
require'torch'
a={'celeba_24_G','celeba_encZ_7','celeba_encY_5'}
for i,v in ipairs(a) 
    do print(v) 
    model_cudnn=torch.load(v..'.t7')
    model_nn=cudnn.convert(model_cudnn, nn):float()
    torch.save(v..'_nn.t7',model_nn)
end

BTW，my torch was installed on 17th Dec,2016

the pytorch version i use：
Metadata-Version: 1.0
Name: torch
Version: 0.1.10+997312c
I Build it from source today

body:
The model is convert from the cudnn model  trained by myseft 
the code below is the convert code

```
require 'nn'
require 'cudnn'
require'torch'
a={'celeba_24_G','celeba_encZ_7','celeba_encY_5'}
for i,v in ipairs(a) 
    do print(v) 
    model_cudnn=torch.load(v..'.t7')
    model_nn=cudnn.convert(model_cudnn, nn):float()
    torch.save(v..'_nn.t7',model_nn)
end  
```

BTW，my torch was installed on 17th Dec,2016

the pytorch version i use：
Metadata-Version: 1.0
Name: torch
Version: 0.1.10+997312c
I Build it from source today
